patthana23.39:4.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.39:4.2: Naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.39:4.3: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca naanidassanasappaṭighaṃ nakusalañca dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho kusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.39:5.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā anidassanaappaṭigho akusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana23.39:6.1: Nasanidassanasappaṭighaṃ naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca sanidassanasappaṭigho abyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana23.39:8.1: Hetuyā ekavīsa, adhipatiyā ekavīsa … pe … avigate ekavīsa.
